data.title: MIGHTY MOUSE Episodes!
data.meta_description:
Yes, you read that right. 
Mighty Mouse episodes. 
My wife heard about this site that has a lot of TV shows, so I clicked on the cartoons section, and low and behold, what do I find…Mighty Mouse! 
I haven’t seen episodes…
data.text:
My wife heard about this site that has a lot of TV shows, so I clicked on the cartoons section, and low and behold, what do I find…Mighty Mouse!

I haven’t seen episodes of that cartoon in ages, and as you can see from my avatar, I love them.

I’m almost through the first episode there. Hopefully it won’t dissapoint me.

You can check them out here:

http://cartoons.peekvid.com/s2405/

[quote]barbos01 wrote:

Speedy will not be shown anymore because he was racist(damn PC thugs). I thought I heard that Mighty Mouse had something to do with drug use and that was the reason he is no longer availible. Anyone know anything about it?[/quote]

“The series was cancelled after two seasons, due to the controversy surrounding an episode in which Mighty Mouse sniffed a red flower he had crushed into a powder. Media watchdog Reverend Donald Wildmon asserted that he was actually snorting cocaine.”
